# 自定义单元格

<template>
  <CurdTable :data="data" :columns="columns" :option="option">
    <template #name="scope">
        姓名：{{ scope.row.name }}
    </template>
  </CurdTable>
</template>
<script setup>
  const data = [
    {
      name: "张三",
      sex: "男",
    },
    {
      name: "李四",
      sex: "女",
    },
    {
      name: "王五",
      sex: "女",
    },
    {
      name: "赵六",
      sex: "男",
    },
  ]
  const columns = [
    { prop: "name", label: "姓名" },
    { prop: "sex", label: "性别" },
  ]
  const option = {
    menuWidth: 200,
    menuBtnTitle: "自定义名称",
  }
  </script>
